name: Eat The Zombies
description:
This game is developed for the ZAM-I game jam.

Survive the horde of zombies.

Keep fighting and don't give up.

Shoot the bullets made from your own flesh to consume the zombies.

The bullets explodes causing equal damage to all the nearby  zombies.

The health of the zombies will be absorbed by you if you manage to hit them .

Or they will come to eat you and you only lose.
